name: commandblocks
author: [royal]sk7725[]
description:
A mod that adds a multitude of new features, such as:
[orange]Next-level Blocks[], such as Command Blocks, Note Blocks or Air Walls;
[white]Commands[] and [accent]Skills[] that you can research and use;
A completely new [scarlet]Gamemode[];
And much more!

[accent]Thanks to:
우파루파, 영감, Xelo, Sonnicon, Gdeft, Eldoofus, EyeofDarkness, SpaceEarthEX[]
[royal]Korean translation by sk7725.[]
[royal]Spanish translation by ThePythonGuy.[]
[royal]Indonesia translation by Gdeft.[]
[royal]Polish translation by Txar.[]

We have a [#7289da]Discord[] server:
https://discord.gg/RCCVQFW[]

[scarlet]Now everything has research costs for campaign! Muahaha![]
